snippet: When support for Representative Kevin McCarthy began to crack, Mr. Chaffetz ran a familiar play: Talk about love of country and prepare for the live shot.
abstract: Rep Jason Chaffetz of Utah has jumped into race for John Boehner's House speaker seat with characteristic boldness, despite long odds he faces in getting nomination; is unclear whether Chaffetz can win enough votes to beat Rep Kevin McCarthy, but fellow lawmakers warn against underestimating the Utah Republican.

keywords.value: House Oversight and Government Reform Committee
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: When support for Representative Kevin McCarthy began to crack, Mr. Chaffetz ran a familiar play: Talk about love of country and prepare for the live shot.

headline.print_headline: A Quixotic Bid to Be Speaker, but in Character
headline.main: For Jason Chaffetz, Quixotic House Speaker Bid Is in Character
